name: Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi DX
summary:
The second phone adaptation of the arcade game Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi. Released for DoJa mobile devices.

Unlike the earlier phone adaptation for J2ME devices, this version features all of the original game's five stages and enhanced graphics.

The new and authentic shooting game of the arcade debut in 2003 is now available on EZweb! A hard world view and serious stories set in the near future, unique characters, and a game system with a high level of challenge are the great attraction of the game. Let's master the new system "Rock Shot" and enjoy a harder high score battle.
